verses.verse: In the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> they into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>

For they were <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Rephidim,<s%> <S%H7508><s%> and were <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4057>desert<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and had <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>camped<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H2022>mount.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

Ye <S%H859><s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and how I <S%H5375>bore<s%> you <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H5404>eagles'<s%> <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> you <S%H413>unto<s%> myself.

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, <S%H518>if<s%> ye will obey my voice <S%H8085>indeed,<s%> <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6963><s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> then ye shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a peculiar <S%H5459>treasure<s%> unto me above <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> is mine:

And <S%H859>ye<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto me a <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> before their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> we will <S%H6213>do.<s%> And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H2009>Lo,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee in a <S%H5645>thick<s%> <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> <S%H5668>that<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H8085>hear<s%> when I <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, and <S%H539>believe<s%> thee <S%H5769>forever.<s%> And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them <S%H3117>today<s%> and <S%H4279>tomorrow,<s%> and let them <S%H3526>wash<s%> their <S%H8071>clothes,<s%>

And <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3559>ready<s%> against the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will come <S%H3381>down<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>

And thou shalt set <S%H1379>bounds<s%> <S%H853><s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourselves, that ye go not <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> or <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H7097>border<s%> of it: <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> shall be surely put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

There shall <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> it, <S%H3588>but<s%> he shall surely be <S%H5619>stoned,<s%> <S%H5619><s%> <S%H176>or<s%> shot <S%H3384>through;<s%> <S%H3384><s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> it be <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2421>live:<s%> when the <S%H3104>trumpet<s%> soundeth <S%H4900>long,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H2022>mount.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and they <S%H3526>washed<s%> their <S%H8071>clothes.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H1961>Be<s%> <S%H3559>ready<s%> against the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> your <S%H802>wives.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> that there <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H6963>thunders<s%> and <S%H1300>lightnings,<s%> and a <S%H3515>thick<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H2389>loud;<s%> so that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H2729>trembled.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> with <S%H430>God;<s%> and they <S%H3320>stood<s%> at the nether <S%H8482>part<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount.<s%>

And <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> was <S%H3605>altogether<s%> on a <S%H6225>smoke,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it in <S%H784>fire:<s%> and the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> thereof <S%H5927>ascended<s%> as the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of a <S%H3536>furnace,<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2729>quaked<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>

And <S%H1961>when<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> sounded <S%H1980>long,<s%> and waxed louder and <S%H2388>louder,<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him by a <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> up <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> Go <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H5749>charge<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> they break <S%H2040>through<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H7200>gaze,<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them <S%H5307>perish.<s%>

And let the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> which come <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> sanctify <S%H6942>themselves,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> break <S%H6555>forth<s%> upon them.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H5749>chargedst<s%> us, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Set <S%H1379>bounds<s%> <S%H853><s%> about the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> it.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H1980>Away,<s%> get thee <S%H3381>down,<s%> and thou shalt come <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee: but let <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> break <S%H2040>through<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he break <S%H6555>forth<s%> upon them.
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them.
